name: Prolimatech PK-3 Nano Aluminum High-Grade 1.5 g Thermal Paste
Features: [High Thermal Conductivity, Low Thermal Resistance, Long-Term Stability, Low dry-out, No "burn-in" time required, Non-Corrosive, Electrically Non-Conductive, Material Specification: Al 70~88(wt%), ZnO 18~34(wt%), Oil 8~12(wt%), Antioxidant 0.5~2(wt%), Adhesiveness: 330000Cps, Thermal Conductivity: 11.2 W/m - Degree C, Thermal Impedance (Resistance): 0.013 Degree C-in2/W, Included: One syringe of thermal compound and one easy-to-spread card., Specific Gravity: 2.7g/cm3]
